gen:link.msg:message: Reported value of ShareCapitalNumberShares at end of period SHOULD be equal to sum of reported value of ShareCapitalNumberShares at beginning of period and changes in that value during period, ShareCapitalNumberSharesMovement. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesEnd return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesStart return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparatePeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

ShareCapitalNumberSharesMovement SHOULD be equal to + ShareCapitalNumberSharesIssue + ShareCapitalNumberSharesPurchase + ShareCapitalNumberSharesGranting + ShareCapitalNumberSharesSale + ShareCapitalNumberSharesWithdrawal + ShareCapitalNumberSharesDistributionAsDividend + ShareCapitalNumberSharesOtherMovements. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesMovement return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesIssue')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesIssue return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesPurchase')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesPurchase return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesGranting')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesGranting return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesSale')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesSale return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesWithdrawal')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesWithdrawal return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesDistributionAsDividend')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesDistributionAsDividend return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesOtherMovements')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSevenVariables1_ShareCapitalNumberSharesOtherMovements return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}

The summation of the reported values for children members SHOULD be equal to the reported value for parent member. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_SumOfMembers return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract1_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}

The summation of the reported values for children members SHOULD be equal to the reported value for parent member. | {for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_SumOfMembers return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")} {for $v in $varArc_NotesShareCapitalStatementOfChanges_MsgSeparateSumOfMembersOnAbstract2_Abstract_ChildrenMember return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | ")}
